name: Fruits of the Apocalypse
description:
You are a post apocalyptic rodent that has to protect the life giving crystal to survive. To defeat the horde of mutant crabs you have to use the same colour ammo as them to stop them. Periodically the Crystal will affect your colour and the enemies so be on alert and defeat your enemies before things get out of control! 

For best experience play 3-4 player co- op. Can be tried single player but not advised.

HOW TO PLAY:
Press A to join the game
Use twin stick to navigate and aim
Use trigger to shot
Press A to pick up fruit ammo
If you pick Ammo that is not colour then you can throw it to a friend
